entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:57 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
